Name: ROBOTIX: The Escape
About the game: Robotix is a platformer adventure game set in a spaceship where you play as a robot. Obstacles stand in your way & you have to avoid them. Play smart & keep your focus to time each jump right & you might just escape. Features: Challenging gameplay Relaxing music Steam Achievements Different obstacles & powerups Enjoy!
